pages.title: Deep Crystal
pages.text: Deep Crystals are the basic ingredient for most of the crafting-recipes of this mod. They can be crafted into many devices as well as $(l:e_item_deep_crystal_tools)Tools/el and $(l:e_item_deep_crystal_armor)Armor/el. The most common source for Deep Crystals is the $(l:e_block_deep_crystal_ore)Deep Crystal Ore/el.
